title: There Will Be Blood (2007) Extended Soundtrack
description:
Please seed for as long as you can, thank you.

Here's the complete score for the film There Will Be Blood. These are all the tracks that i know of, so if there's more that i missed please alert me in the comments section. The most popular track is the much requested "Derrick Explosion" scene music. Thing is, it doesn't exist. It is a modified version of the 2003 track "Convergence" from the soundtrack "Bodysong". Although, if you'd like to try to re-create the music close to the way it sounds in the "Derrick Explosion" scene, you'll be happy to know that, along with other changes, it was basically a combination of "Convergence" and the track "There Will Be Blood".
